text: I have been using JMeter for some months. I have started out on the JMeter user ML mostly to get help with .jmx Samplers and Listeners and the usual sort of problems involved with learning JMeter as a user for testing and monitoring purposes. Notwithstanding, I have compiled the CVS trunk source (20080408). As a result I discovered a very nice feature enhancement suggested in the Comments in the Monitor Results Listener (MonitorHealthVisualizer.java). At the top of the class file: MonitorHealthVisualizer.java  it is stated: <In the future, we may want to add email alerts as a third tab>. Cutting to the chase I took the liberty of implementing the MailerVisualizer functionality as a JSplitPane and added it to the Monitor Results Listener. I have a .PNG screen-shot of the result. I have done no testing. I would like feedback on whether the Mailer Alerts tabbed pane looks as it should and if this is acceptable. If this is acceptable  I would like to complete the testing and learn what I need to do to get the source contributed to the JMeter project. Please find attached the screen-shot described above. Please advise, David.

Created attachment 21810
MonitorHealthVisualizer.java 3rd tabbed pane enhancement

This is a screen-shot of the results of deploying the MailerVisualizer.java functionality as the 3rd tabbed pane in the MonitorHealthVisualizer.java (Monitor Results Listener).
